name: Dungeon and Craft
description:
Wishlist&Follow Dungeon and Craft!



In this adventure with a total of 6 weapons, you will produce your own weapons and turn the mushrooms you collect from the forest into pots that you can sell. In the dungeons, you will fight against challenging creatures for 16 waves and improve your character.

Features :
* Rogue-lite type progression.
* 6 different types of character improvement classes
* 8 different weapons you can craft (4 melee, 4 ranged)
* 10 levels of enhancements for each weapon
* A total of 6 weapons you can equip
* Forest where you can collect mushrooms
* A laboratory where you can produce pot
* A Town Hall where you can sell the weapons and pots you produce
* A total of 5 tier dungeons where you can progress 16 waves
* You can improve your character's stats with Skillpoints
* 30 Different enemy creatures
* 4 different attacking enemy types
* 5 Different Big Bosses
